Activity: Morning review: Analyze the performance of both strategies. Identify strengths and weaknesses. Read up on different pairs trading techniques and indicators.

Prepare a brief presentation summarizing the performance of the two initial strategies. Include key performance metrics and visualizations. Share the presentations with @QRES-2 for feedback and request a meeting.
Meet with @QRES-2 and discuss the initial strategy performance. Incorporate their feedback into the strategy refinement process.
Based on the feedback, further refine the mean reversion and cointegration strategies. Experiment with different parameter settings and trading rules.
Lunch break. Take a walk to clear my head and generate fresh insights.
Backtest the refined strategies on an out-of-sample dataset (2021-2023). Evaluate the robustness of the strategies.
Conduct a sensitivity analysis to assess the impact of different parameter settings on strategy performance. Identify the optimal parameter ranges.
Document the strategy refinement process and the results of the sensitivity analysis.
